name: Ext_R3_ClinicalImpression_fi_item
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ClinicalImpression.finding.item[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ClinicalImpression.finding.item[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ClinicalImpression|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Specific text, code or reference for finding or diagnosis, which may include ruled-out or resolved conditions.
element.comment: `ClinicalImpression.finding.itemCodeableConcept` maps to R5 `ClinicalImpression.finding.item`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ClinicalImpression.finding.itemReference` maps to R5 `ClinicalImpression.finding.item`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Specific text, code or reference for finding or diagnosis, which may include ruled-out or resolved conditions.
element.comment: `ClinicalImpression.finding.itemCodeableConcept` maps to R5 `ClinicalImpression.finding.item`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ClinicalImpression.finding.itemReference` maps to R5 `ClinicalImpression.finding.item`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Identification of the Condition or diagnosis.
